item.title: Click here!
item.dc:creator: @shayneboi1994 shayneboi1994
item.description:
@shayneboi1994 wrote:

@echo off
color f0
echo *******************************
echo Compiler And Run***
echo shaynescape**
echo *******************************
title shaynescape Compile nd Run
echo Compiling Server…
“C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.5.0_09\bin\javac.exe” -cp . *.java
echo Compiling Complete
echo Running Server
java -Xmx1024m -cp .;./jython.jar;./MySql/mysql-connector-java-3.0.17-ga-bin.jar server
pause

so do i paste that into compiler??

item.title: Click here!
item.dc:creator: @system system
item.description:
@system wrote:

U GOT JDK AND LASTEST JAVA if u have paste this into your compiler:
@echo off
color f0
echo *******************************
echo Compiler And Run***
echo YOUR SERVER NAME HERE**
echo *******************************
title YOUR SERVER NAME HERE Compile nd Run
echo Compiling Server…
“C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.5.0_09\bin\javac.exe” -cp . *.java
echo Compiling Complete
echo Running Server
java -Xmx1024m -cp .;./jython.jar;./MySql/mysql-connector-java-3.0.17-ga-bin.jar server
pause
